SPECIES DISTRIBUTED 

The following list represents the general groups and scientific names 
 of fishes produced and distributed to meet fisheries activity 
 responsibilities. The nomenclature used is that established in 
 the American Fisheries Society Special Publication Number 6 (1970), 
 A List of Commom and Scientific Names of Fishes from the United 
 States and Canada. 

MAJOR GROUP AND COMMON NAME 

SCIENTIFIC NAME 

Coldwater (Anadromous) 

ATLANTIC SALMON 
 CHINOOK SALMON 
 CHUM SALMON . . 
 COHO SALMON . . 
 STEELHEAD . . . 

Salmo salar 

Oncorhynchus tshawytscha 
 Oncorhynchus keta 
 Oncorhynchus kisutch 
 Salmo gairdneri 

Coldwater (Non-Anadromous) 

ATLANTIC SALMON . . 
 ARTIC GRAYLING . . 
 BROOK TROUT .... 
 BROWN TROUT .... 
 CHINOOK SALMON . . 
 CUTTHROAT TROUT . . 
 GREENBACK CUTTHROAT 

KOKANEE 

LAHONTAN CUTTHROAT 
 LAKE TROUT .... 
 RAINBOW TROUT . . . 

Salmo salar 
 Tymallus articus 
 Salvelinus fontinalis 
 Salmo trutta 

Oncorhynchus tshawytscha 
 Salmo clarki 
 Salmo clarki stomias 
 Oncorhynchus nerka 
 Salmo clarki henshawi 
 Salvelinus namaycush 
 Salmo gairdneri 

Warmwater (Anadromous) 

STRIPED BASS 

Morone saxatilis 

60
